name: Rachio, Inc.
description: Developer of a sprinkler control system designed to adjust watering amounts. The company's technology saves watering bills using a laptop or smartphone to schedule watering times, forecasts soil and plant type, and sun exposure, and customizes the watering schedule, enabling users to save water and money.
one_liner: Developer of a sprinkler control system designed to adjust watering amounts. The company's technology saves watering bills using a laptop or smartphone to schedule watering times, forecasts soil and plant type, and sun exposure, and customizes the watering schedule, enabling users to save water and money.
